gate.creole.ir.lucene

Class LuceneIREngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.util.AbstractFeatureBearer
      • gate.creole.AbstractResource
        • gate.creole.ir.lucene.LuceneIREngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gate.creole.ir.IREngine, gate.Resource, gate.util.FeatureBearer, gate.util.NameBearer, Serializable

    @CreoleResource(name="Lucene IR Engine",
                tool=true,
                autoinstances=)
public class LuceneIREngine
extends gate.creole.AbstractResource
implements gate.creole.ir.IREngine
    The lucene IR engine. Packages a LuceneIndexManager and a LuceneSearch.
